nodes.text: The GL-77 blaster pistol was a blaster pistol used during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. It was a small, yet powerful blaster pistol that fired high-pitched blaster bolts.

Chairman of Pantora, Chi Cho and his guards utilized these blaster pistols at the Battle of Orto Plutonia, where he lost his life to the Talz. His successor, Notluwiski Papanoida and his son, also used these weapons in a barfight in a cantina on Tatooine. The Snivvian Bounty hunter Sinrich also used one.
